title.rendered: DIY Cake oTols and Pottery Clay Craft 4Pcs Metal Ball Baking Fondant Cake Tools Stainless Steel 8 Head Pen for Sugar Flower | Also Used as Pottery Clay Tools

content.rendered: Specifications Material: Stainless Steel,healthy, tasteless and non corrosive Color: Blue Handle: Handle in plastic sleeve, anti-skid and practical Package Includes: 4 x Fondant Cake Tools Features: 100% Brand new and high quality 4 pcs cake tools with different size balls. Double-headed design,8 different sizes of round head, meeting a variety of use. Used for forming of sugar flowers during DIY baking and help to shape gum paste and make natural curvature of sugar flowers. Also great for manual clay sculpture,just show your imagination. Can be cleaned by water and keep as bright as when new,perfect decoration tools for DIY baking.
